flags.description: Seller in Type|ID format (Broker or Trucker) (required)
flags.name: --seller
flags.validation: Format: Type|ID; allowed types: Broker or Trucker (e.g., Broker|123).

flags.description: Buyer in Type|ID format (Customer or Broker) (required)
flags.name: --buyer
flags.validation: Format: Type|ID; allowed types: Customer or Broker (e.g., Customer|456).

permissions: Authentication required (API token) and authorization per rate agreement policy.
validation_notes: --status is required and must be active or inactive. --seller is required in Type|ID format and must be Broker|ID or Trucker|ID. --buyer is required in Type|ID format and must be Customer|ID or Broker|ID.
